articles.title: Defendant admits in court to killing Slovak journalist Kuciak
articles.description: Miroslav Marcek, one of four defendants in a trial related to the murder of Slovak journalist Jan Kuciak and his fiancee last year, admitted to the killing in court on Monday.
articles.content:
PEZINOK, Slovakia (Reuters) - Miroslav Marcek, one of four defendants in a trial related to the murder of Slovak journalist Jan Kuciak and his fiancee last year, admitted to the killing in court on Monday.
